body:
We want to change both signature and implementation, we do want to have Blob store TensorImplPtr to facilitate the use of IValue in Operators.
On Nov 20, 2018, 8:02 PM -0800, Edward Z. Yang <notifications@github.com>, wrote:
> So, is the point to change the signatures of the functions in question? That seems fine, but you don't need to actually change the internal implementation to change the signatures, no?
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
